Sell items

Looking to sell your items?

Follow just a few simple steps:

1
First you need to log into your Steam account. You can do this by simply clicking the auth button. We have chosen this option as the most convenient and reliable.
2
After logging into your account, you will be able to choose which game items you want to sell. Please, mind the list of games we accept skins from.
3
After a successful transaction,  funds will be sent to your Visa / MasterCard credit / debit card. If you have any questions, please contact us.

We work with the following games:

Selling items Replenishment Steam CONTACTS Privacy Policy Terms of Use

Your payment card details are completely protected against fraud by displaying the form of payment in a frame and then processing them on the side of the official bank using 3DS. The data is processed only for the purpose of providing the target service and is not used for other purposes.

Your personal data, which you may provide to best-skins-forge.club for further processing, is transmitted over a secure communication channel. The SSL certificate is issued by Cloudflare, Inc., which meets security and quality standards.
